titles.title: Open Up My People To My Word And My Truth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Open up My people to My word and My truth
And ye shall know the power of My resurrection life. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Open ye gates, open ye gates.
The King of glory shall come in.
Open ye gates, open ye gates.
The King of glory shall come in.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Abre mi pueblo a mi palabra y mi verdad
conoceréis el poder de mi vida y resurrección. (2). /Abríos puertas, abríos puertas
y el Rey de Gloria entrará./ (2)
